titleStmt.title: An abstract of the duties commanded, and sinnes forbidden in the Law of God. By the Right Reuerend Father in God, George Dovvname, Doctor of Diuinity, and Lord Bishop of Derry
titleStmt.author: Downame, George, d. 1634.
Nicoll, Basill.

notesStmt.note: The first two leaves and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
